tasks.title: Scheduling & Automation System
tasks.description: Phase 3: Scheduling & Automation System - Duration: 8-10 days, Complexity: High (8/10)
tasks.details: This phase implements Redis-based post scheduling, calendar interface, cron job system, and recurring post templates. Key components: 1) Redis queue system with Bull.js for job processing, 2) Calendar view for scheduled posts management, 3) Background job processing for automated posting, 4) Recurring post templates with cron expressions, 5) Queue monitoring dashboard for job status tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Redis connection, verify job scheduling and execution, validate calendar view functionality, test recurring post creation, and ensure queue monitoring works correctly.
